resources.string: This demonstrates how you can implement persistent services that may be started and stopped as desired.
This demonstrates how you can connect with a persistent service. Notice how it automatically starts for you, and play around with the interaction between this and Local Service Controller.
No track start time this recording is garbage
No track start time this recording is garbage
No no sync flag is set yet

NOxDroid is a device and application for showing air pollution in Copenhagen. 

It works by connecting your phone and a gas sensor attached to a IOIO board.
The collected sensor data is used to show a map of pollution levels. 

The project has been made by Pelle Kr√∏gholt, Stine Hartmann Bierre and Andreas Bok Andersen (2011)

More information available on
www.noxdroid.org
Please check that the IOIO turned on and is connected to the phone.\n\Lack of connection might be caused by too low battery level on the IOIO board. In that case please change its battery.
This will end NOxDroid and stop any ongoing recordings
Location service is needed to record your trip. Please turn on either GPS or mobile data.
All three buttons must be green to be able to start the recording.\n\nPlease check the IOIO connection and make sure you have either GPS turned on or have activated mobile data
Click the button to change status of your mobile data connection
